review.title: “Old School”
review.pros: Pros – Compensation was fair. You get your own office. Get to work with cutting edge technology.
review.cons: Cons – You have to wear a tie. No flex in the schedule at all, right down to the half-hour lunch at a specified time. Nothing changes, no opportunity for advancement.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Loosen up.
